Reviews.Title: Shutter broken within a year and they don't honor one year warranty
Reviews.Author: X. Guo
Reviews.Content: The shutter before the camera broken within a year.  Stays open and will not close and it falls out sometimes too.  They are not honoring their one year warranty to repair it.

Reviews.Title: Problems  Problems  Problems
Reviews.Author: itsbob
Reviews.Content: I definitely regret buying this camera. After a few weeks, the battery would no long charge.  I ordered a new battery and it worked for a somewhat longer period of time, but now it won't charge either.I'll never again buy a Casio product.

Reviews.Title: What are you talking about?
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I own a Casio Digital 10.1 mp that I bought off amazon. The cable works perfectly. Just because you had a bad experience, please check your facts with others before you slander a product. Seems like that was just your own experience as my girlfriend owns the same camera in red...no complaints from her either.

Reviews.Title: shipped with wrong cable
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Gillespie
Reviews.Content: Casio was not surprised to receive a call advising that the wrong cable was shipped with this camera!  Don't expect to be able to upload photos until weeks after you request a replacement.  They also demand that the wrong cable be shipped back to them.
